To add someone to your organization enter their e-mail address below. If they don't already have a Postal account, they'll need to create one before you can add them to your account.

What level of access do you wish to grant?

Users who have admin access will be permitted to manage the organization as if they had the same access as the organization owner. This includes managing users, creating & deleting mail servers, and even removing the account. This level of access should granted carefully. Regardless of which level you select, this user will have access to all servers within the organization.
